Name: A.D.M(Angels,Demons And Men)
About the game: Angels,Demons And Men (A.D.M) is a story-driven,hack n slash RPG.A void earth draws near.Ancient demons awaken.Darkness creeps in from the shadows.Stand up,take up your weapons and defend the earth in mankind in his final days. BECOME A ....... A royal knight,Astudent mage or a lost angel. A NEW ADVENTURE...... Explore various locations and slash enemies in tough combat.Experience the story. ASCEND IN STRENGTH.... Gather xp points,magic items and rise in strength level. STORY In order to save her dying lover,Aya,a witch of the order of nine covens cracked a seal on the gates of hell.Accidentally she released cade and his demons from their prison.Now the earth must stand together to survive this new threat.
